casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arkeem Hakim JORDAN 163P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Arkeem Hakim Jordan, For Jordan, Arkeem Hakim. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Defendant for Fourth Amendment Violation: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018." Ervin, J. recused
